itunes:subtitle: Joe Biden is considering a gas tax holiday (but it probably won’t work), a drug cartel’s monkey was tragically killed during a shootout with police, Ross doesn’t understand why anyone wants to watch other people play video games on YouTube, breaking down...
itunes:summary:
Joe Biden is considering a gas tax holiday (but it probably won’t work), a drug cartel’s monkey was tragically killed during a shootout with police, Ross doesn’t understand why anyone wants to watch other people play video games on YouTube, breaking down the new Uvalde shooting footage that proves police had the proper equipment but still didn't go in for an hour, and the Supreme Court ruled in favor of school choice.
